titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh the fourth of March, 1643. Forasmeikle as the Lords of His Majesties Privy Councell of this Kingdome, having, according to the offer made in Parliament, and particular treaty agreed upon with his Majesty and the Parliament of England, sent over to Ireland the number of ten thousand men, ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Evan Tyler, Printer tothe Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed at end: Arch. Primerose Cler. S. Cons.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: Printer tothe Kings most excellent Majestie
